channel.title: Posts on Laura is Here
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Laura is Here

item.title: Dr. Jekyll and Mr. ... Hugo?
item.description:
My experiences with two mainstays in the world of static sites

As a primarily self-taught designer and developer, discovering static site generators marked a breakthrough in my web development skills and, more importantly, work flow and build process.

I cut my teeth on HTML and CSS in plain text files uploaded straight to the server. The first iteration of this site was actually hosted on neocities and was, in fact, primarily edited in their in-browser editor!

item.title: What is a static site?
item.description:
At one point in the now vast history of the web, essentially all websites were static—mostly meaning that they were not dynamic.

To understand this and the implications for us now, let’s take a look at some of the work that goes on behind the scenes when a user visits a site.
